vignette.name: Templates
vignette.bodytext: You can create and use templates in Max. A template is a Max patcher document that includes a patch intended to get you started with certain types of applications you use often. Templates are generally larger and more complex than a clipping, and they open in their own untitled Patcher Window of a preconfigured size rather than being pasted into an unlocked patcher window as a clipping is.

ul.li: Choose File > New > from the edit menu. After the Patcher, Table and Text choices, a list of any templates you may have appears on the New menu. Choose a template from the list and it will open in a new untitled Patcher window

Save the patcher file you want to use as a template to the templates folder inside the patches folder inside the Max application folder. When you restart Max, patcher file you named and saved will appear in the menu listing
